name: Infogestion
tagline: Computer Repair Service in La Plata, Argentina
description: Infogestión was born with the objective of integrating the knowledge of professionals in business management and the new technologies available in the market, always focusing on service and training to organizations. In Infogestión, we not only analyze the current operation and technology of the organization, but also recommend and implement the best alternative with professionals of economic sciences with many years of experience in the world of business management and technology.
